name: Fruit Grabby v1.0.5
description:
Click the fruit (Left Mouse Button) to score points

Each fruit has a different speed and point value, ranging from 25, to 150 per fruit.

Every 2 seconds a new bomb spawns to add difficulty to the game, watch out for these because they can end the game.

Press (f1) for an ingame descriptor, (esc) to close that menu.

Press (esc) to close the game.

Thank you for downloading :)
